400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Format - int32. The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Created date before

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Created date on or after

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Modified date before

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Modified date on or after

parameters.name: reportedBefore
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Reported date before

parameters.name: reportedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Reported On or After

parameters.name: completeBefore
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Completed Before

parameters.name: completeOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Completed On or After

parameters.name: isClosed
parameters.description:
Is Closed
This property is deprecated. Use Statuses instead.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\
\
Available fields are: Id, CreatedOn, DescriptionModifiedOn, CompletedBy, Priority

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format
The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format
The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

404.description: The requested entity was not found

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by server

traceId.description: Internal trace ID for advanced diagnostics

errors.description: Provides more details about errors occurred, which can potentially be used for visual display

data.description: Provides additional data, intended for programmatical usage

ApiErrorResponse.description: Detailed error response, following RFC 7807 recommendations (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807).

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

isClosed.description: This property is deprecated. Use Status instead.

ActiveRequestArg.description: Represents possible HTTP query argument values, when applying filters based on active status.
